meanings.definition: Excessive enthusiasm or obsession with ballet.
meanings.sent1: Her balletomanias led her to attend every ballet performance in town.
meanings.sent2: The balletomanias of the young girl were evident in her room filled with ballet posters.
meanings.sent3: Despite his balletomanias, he still found time to enjoy other forms of art.
meanings.sent4: Her balletomanias were like a whirlwind of passion swirling around her.
meanings.sent5: The intensity of her balletomanias was unmatched by anyone in the ballet community.

meanings.definition: A person who is excessively enthusiastic or obsessed with ballet.
meanings.sent1: The balletomanias was always the first to arrive at ballet class, eagerly waiting for it to start.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the balletomanias of the group due to her unwavering dedication to ballet.
meanings.sent3: The balletomanias joked that they had ballet shoes for every day of the week.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of dancers, she stood out as the balletomanias, shining with her love for ballet.
meanings.sent5: The balletomanias' eyes sparkled with joy whenever ballet was mentioned, a true lover of the art.
